issue.title: To join two arrow tables
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6734](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6734). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Created issue <https://github.com/apache/arrow/issues/5533>

Looking for feature to join two arrow tables

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6734?focusedCommentId=16940515) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Dup of ARROW-4630 (the scope of which is to implement "simple joins"). More efficient / scalable hash joins will be a larger project and require many JIRA issues
